author: Eric Sylvers, Margherita Stancati
title: Slow to Close Businesses, Italy’s Economic Hub Can’t Shake Off Coronavirus - The Wall Street Journal
description: Country faces the challenge of reopening businesses despite a high level of continuing contagion from the virus in its economic heartland
content:
MILANItalys coronavirus pandemic passed its peak three weeks ago. But the ebbing of contagion is slow, prolonging the pain of the national lockdown, and the biggest problem is where it all began: Lombardy.
In Italys most populous and economically important r… [+193 chars]
